about_the_game:
Welcome to Pow Vista, an exciting MMO originally crafted for iOS, now available on Steam!

In Pow Vista, you start your journey as a skateboarder living at home with your mom. Despite her warnings to avoid the skateboarders out in the world, you can't help but explore. Stepping outside, you're greeted by Ava, who hands you your first skateboard. From there, you dive into a world full of challenges and adventures, including the daunting Volcano Challenge where you must defeat a powerful lava boss.

Skateboarding is your primary mode of travel, and as you zoom around the world, you'll gain XP, level up, and encounter other players in real-time. The game features a variety of skills to master, like the Fire skill for cooking and the Water skill for fishing. Rare drops and formidable enemies keep the gameplay fresh.

To really experience the thrill of Pow Vista, you need to dive in and start playing. Get ready to level up, meet new friends, and conquer epic challenges. Enjoy!
